title: 78/868/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 October 1978 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy (region of Latium) pursuant to Directives 72/159/EEC, 72/160/EEC, 72/161/EEC and 75/268/EEC (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 9 October 1978  on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy (region of Latium) pursuant to Directives 72/159/EEC, 72/160/EEC, 72/161/EEC and 75/268/EEC  (Only the Italian text is authentic)  (78/868/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The existing Italian provisions implementing Directives 72/159/EEC, 72/160/EEC, 72/161/EEC and Titles III and IV of Directive 75/268/EEC, having regard to the law of the region of Latium, concerning the "implementation of the Directives of the European Economic Community on the modernization of farms - incorporation of national laws Nos 153/75 and 352/76", notified on 22 June 1978, continue to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to the common measures referred to in Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC, Article 6 of Directive 72/160/EEC, Article 8 of Directive 72/161/EEC and Article 13 of Directive 75/268/EEC.

Article 18 of the law of the region of Latium as cited in the preceding Article satisfies the conditions for  (1)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 302, 4.11.1976, p. 19. (3)OJ No L 145, 13.6.1977, p. 43. (4)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 9. (5)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 15. (6)OJ No L 128, 19.5.1975, p. 1. (7)OJ No L 138, 26.5.1976, p. 14. (8)OJ No L 364, 31.12.1976, p. 62.
financial contribution by the Community to the common measures referred to in Article 13 of Directive 75/268/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 October 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President
